job_details.degree_required: Associate degree in Information Technology or a related field required; Bachelor’s degree preferred

jd: From: Ankit Kumar, Tek Inspirations ankit.k@tekinspirations.com Reply to: ankit.k@tekinspirations.com Senior C# Developer The perfect candidate is someone who has very strong SQL skills (SQL Server, DBA, T-SQL stored procedures, query optimization) as well as some experience with .NET development. Most likely be on-site interviews for both rounds. Candidates will need to be local. The candidate will need to be within a 20–30-minute drive of the Richmond, VA or Prince George, VA areas. There will be on-site requirements for this role in Prince George, VA. US Citizens or Green Card holders only. No relocation - candidate must already be in the area. Key Responsibilities:Develop and enhance applications using C#, ASP.Net Core, and Visual Basic.Migrate legacy VB applications to C# and maintain SQL Server databases.Create and optimize T-SQL stored procedures, SQL Agent jobs, and perform light database administration tasks.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support integration with multiple ERP applications.Develop testing plans and conduct thorough testing of code prior to production rollout.Assist with desktop support and IT infrastructure to maintain 24/7 operations.Required Skills:Proficiency in C#, ASP.Net Core, and Visual Basic (including code translation from VB to C#).Strong experience with Microsoft SQL Server, including T-SQL, stored procedures, and query optimization.Familiarity with Microsoft Operating Systems (Windows 7, 10, Server 2008 and above).Experience with Microsoft Azure DEVOPS.Desired Skills:Basic understanding of Cisco Switches, LAN, and Fiber Optics.Knowledge of EPICS, Sage 100, Global Search, and MP2 is a significant plus.Experience in Azure Cloud development and Android development using Java/Kotlin.Education Requirements:Associate degree in Information Technology or a related field required; Bachelor’s degree preferred.Minimum of 2 years of relevant application development experience in a production environment with required skills.Team Environment:Join a dynamic IT team of 6 within a larger organization of 450+ employees.Casual dress code (jeans).
